name: MPQDraft Plugin File
summary: Learn about .QDP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: QDP files can be embedded into .MPQ files. They are most commonly used to modify StarCraft, a real-time strategy game developed by Blizzard.

description: File used by MPQDraft, an open source program used to modify Blizzard games; contains game modification data used to control game content and create game patches.
